name: The Mandalorian (Fontys Game Design & Technology, JorisK, JoepBohlken)
name_original: The Mandalorian (Fontys Game Design & Technology, JorisK, JoepBohlken)
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE! Description:

A single-player 2D shooter where you collect bounties within the Star Wars galaxy. Every level is a new bounty that you will take on as the Mandalorian. Upon completion of said bounty, you can decide to upgrade your gear. Levels will get increasingly difficult and after having collected a bunch of bounties a final bounty will reveal a familiar face which will lead to the start of the series.

Our google forms: https://forms.gle/jADrxePRFKNMW9WR8

Controls: Movement & Abilities:

Move --> A & D
Jetpack --> Q
Flamethrower --> F

Object Interactions:

Open Doors & weapon pickups --> E
Change floor --> W
Knock on door --> R

Weapon Controls:

Aim --> Hold RMB
Shoot --> LMB (while aiming)
Melee --> LMB (without aiming)
